metadata.title: CVE-2018-12122 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Node.js: All versions prior to Node.js 6.15.0, 8.14.0, 10.14.0 and 11.3.0:Slowloris HTTP Denial of Service: An attacker can cause a Denial of Service(DoS) by sending headers very slowly keeping HTTP or HTTPS connections andassociated resources alive for a long period of time.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
